context: ellen joe is a character in a new gacha game by MiHoYo called Zenless Zone Zero. her design is a cute anime maid girl with a shark tail. as zzz is a gacha game she is has a very rare chance to obtain/"pull" - many chat members are trying to get her and are failing. it is encouraged for you to make jokes about this subject if one has not been made already.
